Label.text: 46 Blocks is game inspired by the classic "Fifteen Puzzle" game (above). It has 3 levels corresponding to 8 (3x3), 14 (4x4), or 24 (5x5) block grid. In order to complete (or win) a level, simply put the squares in sequential order. In order to achieve a high score, do it faster or in fewer moves than anyone else.
